titleInfo.title: MovVis: A movement visualization toolbox for Matlab and Octave

name.namePart: Learning to attend in sensorimotor task

mods.abstract: MovVis creates videos and animated gifs of input movement data. MovVis can display movements in any speed. MovVis has three options for aligning multiple movements. MovVis can display movements on a chosen background image. MovVis can display movements with desired visual attributes.
